DeafenUsers(bool, params IGuildUser[])

Sets the deafen status for a list of users in a guild.

Declaration
public static Task DeafenUsers(bool value, params IGuildUser[] users)
Parameters
Type Name Description
bool value

The deafen status to set. If true, the users will be deafened. If false, the users will be undeafened.
IGuildUser[] users

The users to set the deafen status for.
Returns
